summary: A great House to hang your hat.
descriptionHtml:
A great view and a place to stash your prized possesions, what more could you want?

Thundersnow Manner comes with: 
12 mannequins
12 weapon plaques
chests for storage
alchemy lab
encahnting station
Blacksmith forge and Bench

UPDATE:
added grindstone
smelting station
banners
outside rocks now fit well
lighting
more weapon plaques
weapon rack room

UPDATE 2:
added new room full of weapon racks and plaques
4 new mannequins
2 more weapon display cases
more lighting

UPDATE 3:
2 more mannequins
followers can now enter the manor
author: Hunterguy4
